nishantsharda: This line "how's the Josh" gives goosebumps, it can pump up any cadet at NDA to carry out wonders during his training. But that's a different thing. Right now the sentiments are high, I won't call it Josh. Because we as a country are high on emotions as always, that's how we are tuned for some weird reason. We get emotional too soon and then we act out of our emotions. The prime minister knows that, and to cash on this "opportunity" he said that "unhone bahot badi galti kardi hai". My dear fellow countrymen, do not get so hyper by these words of our PM. doesn't mean we are going to war. He said it because he knows what the janta wants. War is not the solution. And do you think we don't retaliate to such incidents? We do! Every single day men die who you are not even aware about. their deaths are not known to you, but every single day a soldier dies at the line of duty. So don't think even for a second that the country is coward and that we need to take action. As far as actions are concerned, that would be at the right time at the right place.
